description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Adelaide Hills, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Adults-Only Adelaide Hills Escape with Wine Tasting, A$100 Credit & Nightly Drinks
hotels.description: Drink in the splendour of the renowned Adelaide Hills wine region from this exclusive adults-only retreat, awarded Tripadvisor's 2025 #1 Luxury Hotel and #1 Small Hotel in Australia and The South Pacific. Be enveloped by beautifully appointed accommodation, breathtaking views of Mount Lofty and the Piccadilly Valley and over 170 years of history at the five-star Mount Lofty House Estate - Adults Retreat. Heritage meets grandeur at this awe-inspiring 19th-century estate, reminiscent of a stately English country manor, with 30 acres of sprawling vines and manicured gardens. The cherry on top? The chef-hatted deliciousness at Hardy’s Verandah Restaurant. After days spent exploring over 200 vineyards and cellar doors in the Adelaide Hills, Barossa Valley and McLaren Vale, treat yourself to a smoke-infused tipple at Arthur Waterhouse Lounge, soak up the views at Terrace Garden Bar or relax at the hands of an expert spa therapist at Gatekeeper's Day Spa.

hotels.title: Extended by Popular Demand: Tranquil Adelaide Hills Vineyard Retreat with Breakfast Provisions, Wine Tasting & Welcome Wine
hotels.description: Prepare to be swept away by the beauty of South Australia’s striking Adelaide Hills region during a romantic retreat filled with good food and fine wine at this picturesque family-owned vineyard. Located less than an hour’s drive from Adelaide, just outside the historic township of Macclesfield, Longview Vineyard is one of the region’s most awarded wine producers. Tuck into delicious Italian-inspired fare, indulge in wine-tasting experiences at the Cellar Door and get pampered at the Longview Day Spa. Longview offers not only fine wine and delectable food, but also beautifully styled suites nestled amid 200 acres of rolling hills and verdant vineyards - making this the perfect getaway for lovers of the finer things in life.

hotels.title: Adelaide Hills Boutique Adults-Only Escape with Award-Winning Restaurant
hotels.description: Drink in the splendour of the celebrated Adelaide Hills wine region and the breathtaking beauty of the Piccadilly Valley with a stay at the Mount Lofty House, a five-star adults-only retreat with almost 150 years of history. An oasis of serenity, with all the trimmings needed for an indulgent gourmet escape, it’s hard to believe that this storied setting is just a 20-minute drive from Adelaide's CBD. Feel a world apart from anywhere else: treat yourself with three-chef-hatted deliciousness at Hardy’s Verandah Restaurant, lavish in the attention of an expert spa therapist or take a wander through the grounds as if they were your own - after a day of vineyard hopping, of course.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Adelaide Hills Luxury Lodge with Three Chef Hat Restaurant
hotels.description: Hide away from the rest of the world at the intimate adults-only Sequoia Lodge, a five-star private sanctuary nestled in the Adelaide Hills. An oasis of serenity, with all the trimmings needed for an indulgent gourmet escape, it’s hard to believe that this storied setting is just a 20-minute drive from Adelaide's CBD. Feel a world apart from anywhere else: treat yourself with three-chef-hatted deliciousness at Hardy’s Verandah Restaurant, lavish in the attention of an expert spa therapist or take a wander through the grounds as if they were your own - after a day of vineyard hopping, of course. The estate also features artesian spring-fed hot pools, an infinity pool and a wildlife enclosure.

hotels.title: Luxurious Adelaide Hills Escape Just 30 Minutes from CBD
hotels.description: Unwind at The Crafers Hotel, a gorgeous heritage hotel in the Adelaide Hills - a picture-perfect leafy haven less than 30 minutes' drive from the city. Built in the 19th century, the hotel was one of Adelaide's first pubs and is steeped in history. The interior pays tribute to its past with a Wine Room serving a variety of rare and classic local and international wines. Beer and cider enthusiasts need not miss out: pull up a seat in the historic pub and check out the extensive, everchanging drinks menu alongside a mouthwatering French-inspired dining menu. The treasures of Adelaide Hills are also at your fingertips. Spend days following winding roads flanked by pine trees to renowned wineries like The Lane Vineyard (only a 15-minute drive from the hotel), plus countless distilleries, microbreweries, chocolatiers, fromageries and more.
